itunes:title: Episode 623 - Alek Skarlatos Runs For Congress!
title: Episode 623 - Alek Skarlatos Runs For Congress!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back Paris Train hero Alek Skarlatos not to discuss a movie, but instead, discuss his running for Congress and how it is going to be another avenue for him to serve his country. He talks about policy he wants to pa...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back Paris Train hero Alek Skarlatos not to discuss a movie, but instead, discuss his running for Congress and how it is going to be another avenue for him to serve his country. He talks about policy he wants to pass while in Congress and what his game plan is to get elected successfully.

Ghostbed.com/DrinkinBros

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back Paris Train hero Alek Skarlatos not to discuss a movie, but instead, discuss his running for Congress and how it is going to be another avenue for him to serve his country. He talks about policy he wants to pass while in Congress and what his game plan is to get elected successfully.
